name: Kite Realty Group Trust
description: Kite Realty Group Trust is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on owning, operating, and developing retail and mixed-use properties. Founded in 2004, the company is based in Indianapolis, Indiana, and is committed to creating vibrant, community-centered shopping and dining experiences. Kite Realty's portfolio includes a diverse range of properties, predominantly grocery-anchored shopping centers, which are strategically located in high-demand markets across the United States. The company emphasizes sustainability and innovation in property management, striving to enhance the customer experience while maximizing the value of its assets. Kite Realty also engages in proactive leasing and tenant relations, ensuring a strong mix of national and local retailers that cater to the needs of the communities it serves. With a focus on growth and value creation, Kite Realty is well-positioned to capitalize on trends in the retail sector, including the increasing popularity of experiential retail and urban living developments. The company is dedicated to delivering long-term value to its shareholders through disciplined capital allocation and investment strategies.

seo.meta_title: Kite Realty Group Trust | Innovative Retail Real Estate Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Kite Realty Group Trust, a leading REIT specializing in retail and mixed-use properties. Discover our commitment to community, sustainability, and growth.

faq.question: What does Kite Realty Group Trust do?
faq.answer: Kite Realty Group Trust is a real estate investment trust that focuses on owning and managing retail and mixed-use properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Kite Realty Group?
faq.answer: John A. Kite is the CEO of Kite Realty Group Trust.

faq.question: Where is Kite Realty headquartered?
faq.answer: Kite Realty is headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Kite Realty own?
faq.answer: Kite Realty primarily owns grocery-anchored shopping centers and mixed-use developments.

faq.question: When was Kite Realty founded?
faq.answer: Kite Realty Group Trust was founded in 2004.
